title: How is St .Antony’s hostel? - Quora
tags: St Antony's Public School Anakkal - S A P S

response.answer_text: i wud be lying if i said tht it is the best hostel…but yeah when it comes to ambience…study atmosphere and mess food..it is the best..!! But if you go there expecting the typical filmy style hostel life..you r going to the wrong place my friend…SAPS nd its hostels are only meant for studies and results…literally ….only studies..so if you want a gr8 score for ur boards its the best place..(NB: tours are rare nd the farewell is nt hw u expect it to be..)
